Load WFS data

Source: R/load_wfsdata.R
load_wfsdata.Rd

load_wfsdata(): Wrapper function for get_map_data() that retrieves WFS data from a WFSClient URL, optionally transforms it to WGS 84 format, and optionally dissolves the data.

Usage

load_wfsdata(url = NULL, typename = NULL, wgs84 = TRUE, dissolve = TRUE)

Arguments

url

URL to a service from which to retrieve geospatial data

typename

Name of the layer to retrieve from the service

wgs84

Logical indicating whether to transform the data to WGS 84 format, default is TRUE

dissolve

Logical indicating whether to dissolve the data, default is TRUE

Value

An sf object

See also

browse_wfsdata(), get_map_data()

Examples

load_wfsdata(
url = "https://geo.stat.fi/geoserver/tilastointialueet/wfs",
typename = "tilastointialueet:kunta1000k")
#> Simple feature collection with 1 feature and 1 field
#> Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
#> Dimension:     XY
#> Bounding box:  xmin: 19.30413 ymin: 59.7581 xmax: 31.5867 ymax: 70.09266
#> Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
#> # A tibble: 1 × 2
#>   rmapshaperid                                                              geom
#> *        <int>                                                <MULTIPOLYGON [°]>
#> 1            0 (((21.00936 60.22672, 21.00902 60.22529, 21.00712 60.22446, 21.0…
